attributes.action: A second EU referendum should NOT be allowed. The result must stand.
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, demand that MP's and the House of Lords, honour the result of the referendum to leave the EU.
attributes.background: When the Referendum was announced it was an in or out question and it was for the majority to decide.It would undemocratic now to attempt to overturn the will of the people, which MUST take precedence over the transient views of politicians.
